name: radioactivity_concentration_of_154Eu_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Eu" means the element "europium" and "154Eu" is the isotope "europium-154" with a half-life of 3.13e+03 days.
